page.shortlink: api client api a5 buttonlist setdisabled method

argument.name: value
argument.description: The value of the button to set the disabled state of the button list.

argument.name: disabled
argument.description: The disabled state of the specified button in the button list, or the entire button list if no value is passed in.

page.description: Set a button or the entire button list disabled.

discussion.p: If a "value" is passed in then the button with the corresponding value in the button list will have its disabled state set. Otherwise the disabled state of the entire button list will be set.
